InvoiceBatchRun.name: InvoiceBatchRun
InvoiceBatchRun.description: Represents a batch processing job in Billing. During an invoice batch run, all billing schedules that meet the specified criteria are processed, resulting in the generation of invoices.

BillingBatchSchedulerId.description: Required. The ID of the related billing batch scheduler.

Comments.description: Additional notes or comments for the invoice batch run.

CompletionTime.description: The timestamp when the invoice batch run finished processing.

CreditApplicationStatus.description: The status of applying credit memos or credit memo lines to invoices or invoice lines during invoices batch runs.

DocGenCompletionTime.description: The completion time of generating invoice documents by the invoice batch run.

DocGenStartTime.description: The start time of generating invoice documents by the invoice batch run.

DocGenStatus.description: The status of the invoice documents generated by the invoice batch run.

InvoiceBatchRunNumber.description: Required. The auto-generated reference number for the invoice batch run.

InvoiceDocsGenFailed.description: The number of invoice documents that the invoice batch run failed to generate.

InvoiceDocsGenerated.description: The number of invoice documents that the invoice batch run generated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed an invoice batch run record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed an invoice batch run record. If this value is null, it’s possible that the user only accessed the invoice batch run record or a related list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed the invoice batch run record itself.

OwnerId.description: Required. The ID of the user who created the related billing batch scheduler.

RecoveryStatus.description: The status of the invoice batch run recovery process.

StartTime.description: Required. The timestamp when the invoice batch run started processing.

Status.description: Required. The status of the invoice batch run.

StatusSubtype.description: The status subtype of the invoice batch run. The subtype corresponds to the status of the invoice batch run.

TotBillSchdUpdtDurDrftToPost.description: The total duration taken to update the billing schedule from Draft to Posted status during an invoice batch run.

TotalBillSchedRecovered.description: The number of billing schedules that were a part of the recovery run that were reset to Ready for Invoicing. These billing schedules are included in the next scheduled invoice batch run.

TotalBillSchedUnrecovered.description: The number of billing schedules that were a part of the recovery run that weren’t reset to Ready for Invoicing. These billing schedules that weren’t successfully recovered must be manually reset to Ready for Invoicing so they can be processed.

TotalBillingSchedulesFailed.description: The total number of billing schedules that weren’t successfully processed. When a billing schedule isn’t successfully processed, then the system doesn’t generate an invoice for it. For details about errors, check the Revenue Transaction Error Log.

TotalBsSuccessfullyProcessed.description: The total number of billing schedules for which the system was able to generate and process invoices.

TotalDraftInvoiceAmount.description: The total amount of all invoices in the Draft status.

TotalDraftInvoices.description: The total number of invoices in the Draft status.

TotalFilteredBillingSchedules.description: The total number of billing schedules that met the invoice run scheduler’s matching criteria. The matching criteria specify which billing schedules are included in the invoice batch run. The field label is Total Matching Billing Schedules.

TotalInvSuccessfullyProcessed.description: The total number of invoices that were successfully processed.

TotalInvoicedAmount.description: The total amount of income including taxes that’s represented by the successfully processed invoices.

TotalInvoicesCanceled.description: The total number of invoices that weren’t processed. To find out what went wrong, check the Revenue Transaction Error Log. Then fix the errors and run the invoice batch run recovery process.

TotalInvoicesFailed.description: The total number of invoices that weren’t processed successfully. To find out what went wrong, check the Revenue Transaction Error Log. Then fix the errors and run the invoice batch run recovery process.

TotalInvoicesGenerated.description: The total number of invoices that were generated from the billing schedules processed by the invoice batch run.

TotalPostedInvoices.description: The total number of invoices in Posted status that were generated from the billing schedules.

InvoiceBatchRun.accessRules: the Billing Admin permission set to access this object
